name: Global War
overview: Global War is a tactical game. The player is the leaders of of nuclear empire and contending with four countries for world domination. The player's task is to bring the victory their own State by the annihilation of the other countries. Each leader can use conventional weapons, nuclear weapons and propaganda attack. A player can do only one thing at every turn. After the end of turn the game moves to the world map to show the activities of all commanders in the form of animations and messages. The game ends when on the battlefield remained the same state.
